about: I'm a versatile JS developer with a strong grounding in both the front and back end, and I'm searching for a position as a React developer. React is my main strength, but I hope to be able to find a position where I might have opportunities to put other skills to work too.

I began coding as a hobbyist at a young age and decided to make a career out of it in Autumn of 2018. My long-enduring interest in computing gives me the drive necessary to keep up with the rapid pace of development in the field.

jobs.title: Full-Stack JS Developer
text: Most of my time at TERDSGN was spent working as a contractor for Petasense, a Silicon Valley company. My main duty was to turn sketch mockups into functional components for a React/Redux webapp. I also created actions and reducers for interacting with the internal API, and I occasionally used D3 for data visualisation. As a team we followed Atomic Design principles in regards to our internal organisation and to the structure of our project.
I was also responsible for developing a Selenium framework for automated cross-browser testing, and I was able to significantly increase the webapp's browser compatibility range.

I was the sole developer of Iteration1, a complex medium-sized internal project currently in closed beta, which required a webapp, and a server with a database. I developed it using React/Redux, Express, and MongoDB over a period of three months.
I also worked briefly with React Native during this period.
As part of TERDSGN I was the sole developer of Hexagoal, a React and canvas based image creation application
Most recently I have been developing another medium sized React/Redux application for a US-based company for Voicegain. I used D3 for data visualisation.

skills: A versatile developer who welcomes new challenges
Over a year of React/Redux with no interruption
I have worked in large SCRUM teams, and solo
RESTful APIs with Node, Express, and MongoDB
Responsive layouts with CSS Grid and Flexbox
Over a year of using git for version control
Testing with Mocha, Chai, Jest, Selenium
